title: 7 Perch Land for Sale in Malabe, Pothuarawa
details:
Malabe, Pothuarawa (Amaragoda Road) Near to Hokandara 7 Perch land available.
* Most suitable for a residential purpose.
* Calm & safe environment.
* 2 sides of the land is covered with a parapet wall.

1.5 km to Malabe town
4.5 km to Palawaththa
3.5 km to Athurugiriya Expressway interchange.

Price per perch Rs:650,000/- ( Negotiable ) No Brokers Please.

Contact: Ishanka - 0754477514 / 0753373677
